history.desc: Give an account about the history of the manuscript and its owners. Distinguish between the previous owners ("Provenance"), and how it came into the present collection ("Acquisition").

valItem.desc: signals that the application's default white-space processing modes are acceptable アプリケーションがデフォルトで持つ空白文字類処理モードが有効であることを知らせる。
indicates the intent that applications preserve all white space アプリケーションがすべての空白文字類を保持するという意図を示す。

summary.desc: Outline the history of circulation or acquisition of this manuscript or manuscript part.

provenance.desc: Give an account of how the manuscript passed into the hands of later owners according to the following criteria relevant persons, dates, etc.

date.desc: Fill in the date in CE. The date refers to the acquisition (not the production of the copy).

quote.desc: Transcribe relevant portion of the text.

locus.desc: Specify range of folios within the manuscript. Recto and verso are indicated as "r" and "v".

persName.desc: Look up the person records in the database. Try different spellings in different languages! If no suitable record exists, create a new one. Add additional persons as required.

stamp.desc: Describe stamps left by libraries or other institutions to mark manuscripts as their property.

placeName.desc: Look up the place records. Try different spellings in different languages! If no suitable record exists, create a new one. The place given here refers to the acquisition (and not the production of the copy).

acquisition.desc: Give an account of how the manuscript came into the collection where it is now held according to the following criteria relevant persons, dates, etc.

placeName.desc: Look up the place records. Try different spellings in different languages! If no suitable record exists, create a new one. The place given here refers to the acquisition (and not the production of the copy).

date.desc: Fill in the date in CE. The date refers to the acquisition (not the production of the copy).

stamp.desc: Describe stamps left by libraries or other institutions to mark manuscripts as their property.

persName.desc: Look up the person records in the database. Try different spellings in different languages! If no suitable record exists, create a new one. Add additional persons as required.

locus.desc: Specify range of folios within the manuscript. Recto and verso are indicated as "r" and "v".

quote.desc: Transcribe relevant portion of the text.
